definition: festival entertainment (lion dance, dragon lantern etc)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Shehuo is a continuation of an ancient tradition of offering sacrifices to Land Gods and Fire Gods.
sentences.chinese: 社火是古代祭祀土地神和火神活动的延续。

sentences.english: Such as "curse agency fire" and "Naochun officials" are all the typical carnival phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 如“骂社火”和“闹春官”等都是典型的狂欢现象。

sentences.english: The parade is warmly welcomed by the local people.
sentences.chinese: “社火”活动很受当地人们的欢迎。

sentences.english: Today's fire Mashao's Face, from senior civil artists hands.
sentences.chinese: 当今的社火马勺脸谱，出自民间资深艺人之手。

definition: Yangge, a popular rural folk dance
waist drum/waist-drum dance (Han ethnic group folk dance)
genre of song-and-dance duet popular in Inner Mongolia
folk festival, esp. involving shrine or image of God
opera for popular in Sichuan and Yunnan
